revised_title: Tides Observations in Kamtchatka and Sitkhce Island
tldr: The author presents additional research on tides, specifically observations made in Petropaulofsk, Kamtchatka, and Novo-Arkhangelsk, Sitkhce Island. The study discusses the diurnal inequality in tide heights and the theory behind these phenomena. The results provide valuable data for understanding tidal patterns and ocean dynamics.
